name: pnp-list-formatting-request-sign-off
title: Request Sign-off
shortDescription: This sample provides a custom view to focus on files within a document library that need to be approved. A Power Automate flow is included to request sign-off (and to launch that flow directly from the view). This format provides a better visual indication of where documents are in the approval process.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
